meanings.definition: Having the greatest range in size or extent.
meanings.sent1: The giraffe is the rangiest animal in the zoo, towering over all the others.
meanings.sent2: The desert is the rangiest place I've ever seen, stretching out as far as the eye can see.
meanings.sent3: The teacher's to-do list was the rangiest I've ever seen, with tasks covering the entire whiteboard.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination was the rangiest of all her friends, always coming up with the most creative ideas.
meanings.sent5: The mountain range was the rangiest sight I had ever beheld, with peaks disappearing into the clouds.

meanings.definition: Having the greatest range in color or variety.
meanings.sent1: The butterfly had the rangiest wings, displaying a multitude of vibrant colors.
meanings.sent2: The art gallery had the rangiest collection of paintings, from abstract to realistic.
meanings.sent3: Her wardrobe was the rangiest in the office, with outfits for every occasion.
meanings.sent4: The garden was the rangiest display of flowers, with every hue imaginable blooming.
meanings.sent5: The market had the rangiest selection of fruits and vegetables, from exotic to local produce.
